name: GRAVITATIO
description:
GRAVITATIO is a game where you manipulate gravity to do your bidding. There are 4 worlds and 36 levels (including the 3 tutorial levels), and you as the player, have to get to the finish area without hitting any walls. This is the Web Version of the game, the full version is on the Google Play Store.

If, for whatever reason, you can't play the game on Itch.io, Here is a link to Unity Play https://play.unity.com/mg/other/gravitatio-web-version

You can download it on the Google Play Store Here https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JbrosDev.GRAVITATIO

Game by JBros Development.

This game was built with the Unity Game Engine.

The UI Icons were taken from the Unity Asset store { Artist / That Witch Design ( Name / Simple Button Set 01)}

{Song Stanley Shrke} by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org).
